items.title: 苹果2026年智能眼镜：五大预期功能 (原标题: Apple's 2026 Smart Glasses: Five Key Features to Expect)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# 苹果2026年智能眼镜：五大预期功能

苹果正在加速其智能眼镜的开发，以期与Meta Ray-Bans竞争。为了优先推出这款产品，苹果已暂停了下一代Vision Pro的开发工作。

![苹果眼镜黄色功能](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Qhtq0P3kGynRd1ZOvS-k8heAtT0=/400x0/article-new/2021/01/Apple-Glasses-Yellow-Feature.jpg?lossy)

### 1. 紧随时尚潮流
与初代Apple Watch类似，苹果眼镜将被定位为时尚配饰，而非笨重且款式有限的框架。苹果计划提供多种镜框和镜腿材料选项，以实现个性化外观。尽管需要为电池、芯片和多个摄像头预留空间，但预计会有不同的颜色、尺寸和形状选择。Meta最初的Ray-Bans款式有限，但近年来已增加了更多形状、颜色并扩展到Oakley镜框。

### 2. Siri将扮演核心角色
苹果智能眼镜的发布依赖于功能强大的下一代Siri。控制将主要基于语音，因此Siri需要足够智能，能够理解用户意图并执行操作。苹果已使用大型语言模型重构Siri，预计更智能的Siri（类似于Claude、Gemini或ChatGPT）将于2026年春季推出。通过集成摄像头，Siri将能够提供视觉反馈、查找信息、翻译外语、记住停车位置或钥匙位置、提供任务指导、播放音乐、发送消息等，以匹配Meta AI的功能。

### 3. 传闻中的功能
苹果第一代眼镜不会像Meta最新的Ray-Ban Display眼镜那样包含显示屏，但将具备Meta较便宜Ray-Bans相同的AI功能、摄像头和音频能力。已知的传闻功能包括：
*   拍照
*   录制视频
*   播放音频（包括播客、音乐和有声读物）
*   提供导航
*   回答问题
*   描述周围环境
*   通过视觉智能识别植物、动物、地标等
*   拨打电话
*   发送消息
*   翻译语言

### 4. 仍需依赖iPhone
苹果眼镜将搭载基于Apple Watch芯片设计的苹果自研芯片，但仍需连接iPhone才能使用。它们无法独立运行，需要iPhone进行AI处理和其他功能支持，这也有助于延长电池续航。

### 5. 最早可能在2026年亮相
苹果正在加快智能眼镜的开发，目前的传闻表明苹果可能在2026年末展示这款产品，并可能在2026年宣布，2027年初上市。目前尚无定价信息，但Meta Ray-Bans起价380美元，苹果可能会采取有竞争力的定价策略。
items.shortSummary: 苹果正加速开发其智能眼镜，目标在2026年末发布，2027年初上市。该产品将定位为时尚配饰，并深度集成下一代Siri，支持语音控制、视觉反馈、翻译及多媒体功能。它将具备拍照、录像、音频播放等能力，但不会配备显示屏。眼镜将搭载自研芯片，但需连接iPhone进行AI处理和功能支持。苹果旨在与Meta Ray-Bans竞争，定价可能具有竞争力。
items.translated_title: 苹果2026年智能眼镜：五大预期功能
items.content:
Apple is working on a set of smart glasses to rival the Meta Ray-Bans, and now that Meta has debuted glasses that include a display, Apple wants to speed up development on its first-generation model. Work has stopped on the next Vision Pro so that Apple can prioritize getting the glasses to market.


They'll Be Fashion Forward


Like the initial versions of the Apple Watch, the Apple Glasses will be a fashion accessory rather than clunky frames with limited style availability.

Apple is planning to offer multiple frame and temple material options for a personalized look. There needs to be space for a battery, a chip, and multiple cameras, so it's not clear how slim Apple can get the glasses, but different color, size, and shape options are likely.

Meta had limited color and style options for its Ray-Bans to begin with, but over the last few years, it's added more shapes and colors, and expanded to Oakley frames.

Siri Will Play a Major Role


Apple can't release smart glasses until it has a functional, next-generation version of Siri. Controls will be largely voice based, which means ‌Siri‌ needs to be intelligent enough to understand what you want and act on it.

Apple rearchitected ‌Siri‌ with large language models, and a smarter ‌Siri‌ that's more like Claude, Gemini, or ChatGPT is coming in spring 2026.

You should be able to ask ‌Siri‌ all kinds of questions, and with cameras integrated into Apple's glasses, ‌Siri‌ could be able to do things like provide feedback on what you're seeing, look things up for you, translate foreign languages, remember where you parked or put your keys, offer instructions to help you with tasks, play music, send messages, and more.

Apple will want to match many of the features of the Meta Ray-Bans, and Meta AI can do all of the above.

Rumored Apple Glasses Features


Apple's first-generation glasses won't include a display like Meta's latest Ray-Ban Display glasses, but they will have the same AI features, cameras, and audio capabilities of Meta's less expensive Ray-Bans.

We don't know everything about Apple's glasses yet, but we've heard rumors about some of the capabilities that will be included.

  • Take photos

  • Record video

  • Play audio, including podcasts, music, and audiobooks

  • Offer directions

  • Answer questions

  • Describe your surroundings

  • Identify plants, animals, landmarks and more with Visual Intelligence

  • Make phone calls

  • Send messages

  • Translate languages



You'll Still Need Your iPhone


The Apple glasses will have an Apple-designed chip that's based on the chip in the Apple Watch, but you're still going to need an iPhone to use them. They won't be able to operate standalone, and will need a connection to an ‌iPhone‌ for AI processing and other features.

We don't know what the battery life will be like, but handing tasks off to the ‌iPhone‌ should help extend battery life.

We Could See the Glasses as Soon as 2026


Apple is speeding up development on the smart glasses, and current rumors suggest Apple could show them off in late 2026. It sounds like Apple might announce them in 2026 and then launch them in early 2027.

There is no word yet on how much the glasses might cost, but Meta Ray-Bans start at $380 and Apple may want to price its version competitively.

Read More


We have an Apple Glasses guide that aggregates all of the rumors that we've heard so far. We update it regularly when new info comes out.
Tag: Apple Glasses

items.title: 苹果发布 Safari 技术预览版 229，包含错误修复和性能改进 (原标题: Apple Releases Safari Technology Preview 229 With Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# 苹果发布 Safari 技术预览版 229

苹果于2025年10月2日发布了实验性浏览器 Safari 技术预览版（Safari Technology Preview）的最新更新，版本号为 229。该浏览器于2016年3月首次推出，旨在让用户测试未来 Safari 浏览器版本中计划发布的功能。

![Safari 技术预览版更新功能 1](https://images.macrumors.com/t/4wGm3KfXNBIwQ0MGXSmcCu6K0w=/400x0/article-new/2024/07/Safari-Technology-Preview-Updated-Feature-1.jpg?lossy)

**主要更新内容：**

*   **修复与改进：** 版本 229 包含了针对辅助功能 (Accessibility)、CSS、事件 (Events)、表单 (Forms)、JavaScript、网络 (Networking)、SVG、存储 (Storage)、Web API、Web Inspector、WebDriver 和 WebGPU 的修复和更新。
*   **兼容性：** 当前的 Safari 技术预览版兼容运行 macOS Sequoia 和 macOS Tahoe 的设备。
*   **获取方式：** 任何已从苹果官网下载该浏览器的用户，都可以通过“系统偏好设置”或“系统设置”中的“软件更新”机制获取此更新。
*   **发布目的：** 苹果的目标是收集开发者和用户对其浏览器开发过程的反馈。
*   **使用特点：** Safari 技术预览版可以与现有 Safari 浏览器并行运行，虽然主要面向开发者，但下载和使用无需开发者账户。
*   **完整发布说明：** 可在 Safari 技术预览版网站上查阅。

## 其他热门新闻

文章还提到了近期苹果相关的其他热门新闻：

### 1. 苹果十月活动展望
*   **日期：** 2025年9月29日
*   **内容：** 讨论了在年度 iPhone 发布会之后，苹果是否会在10月举办另一场活动以发布更多产品。
*   **历史回顾：** 苹果最近的10月活动分别在2021年和2023年举行，而2022年和2024年则没有。

### 2. 苹果 iPhone 驾照功能已在11个美国州推出
*   **日期：** 2025年9月30日
*   **内容：** 美国部分州的居民现在可以将驾照或州身份证添加到 iPhone 和 Apple Watch 的“钱包”应用中。
*   **用途：** 在指定机场、商家和应用程序中，提供便捷的非接触式身份或年龄证明。
*   **最新进展：** 北达科他州已正式支持此功能，使总数达到11个州。

### 3. 昨天泄露的所有苹果新产品
*   **日期：** 2025年10月1日
*   **内容：** 结合俄罗斯 YouTube 视频和美国联邦通信委员会 (FCC) 文件，多款即将发布的苹果产品被泄露。
*   **泄露产品：** 搭载 M5 芯片的 iPad Pro、更新的 MacBook Pro 和 Apple Vision Pro 型号。
*   **备注：** 这些设备此前已有传闻。

### 4. 搭载 M5 芯片的新款 iPad Pro 在开箱视频中泄露
*   **日期：** 2025年9月30日
*   **内容：** 俄罗斯 YouTube 频道 Wylsacom 上传了一段未发布的搭载 M5 芯片的 iPad Pro 开箱视频。
*   **可信度：** 该频道曾准确泄露14英寸 M4 芯片 MacBook Pro，因此此次泄露被认为是真实的。
*   **细节：** 视频中展示的似乎是13英寸 iPad Pro，配备 M5 芯片和 256GB 存储。

### 5. FCC 意外泄露苹果下一代 Vision Pro
*   **日期：** 2025年9月30日
*   **内容：** 美国联邦通信委员会 (FCC) 的文件似乎证实了苹果正在开发更新版 Vision Pro 头显。
*   **证据：** FCC 分享的文件中提到了一款型号为 A3416 的苹果设计的“头戴设备”，附带的图片证实其为 Vision Pro。
*   **文件类型：：** FCC 上传的文件包括传输测试和 SAR 测试报告。

### 6. FCC 泄露即将推出的 MacBook Pro 及更多产品
*   **日期：** 2025年9月30日
*   **内容：** FCC 证实了苹果正在开发新版 MacBook Pro 和其他几款产品，提前泄露了设备细节。
*   **证据：** FCC 发布的文件中提到了与现有设备不符的型号，例如 A3434 指的是未发布的 MacBook Pro。

### 7. iOS 26.1 至 iOS 26.4 将为 iPhone 带来新功能
*   **日期：** 2025年10月1日
*   **内容：** iOS 26.1 的测试版已在进行中，将带来更多功能。
*   **iOS 26.1 新功能：** 苹果智能 (Apple Intelligence) 和兼容 AirPods 的实时翻译功能支持更多语言，以及 Apple Music、日历、照片和 Safari 的一些小改动。
*   **展望：** 未来版本将包含更多功能和变化。

### 8. 新款 iPhone 需求“强于预期”
*   **日期：** 2025年10月2日
*   **内容：** iPhone 17 系列发布近两周后，摩根士丹利分析师表示，基于苹果在线商店的延长发货预估和供应链信息，需求“略强于我们最初的预期”。
*   **具体表现：** iPhone 17 和 iPhone 17 Pro 的早期需求强劲。

### 9. 苹果2025年产品路线图：还有哪些产品即将推出
*   **日期：** 2025年10月1日
*   **内容：** 展望2025年底前预计发布的新产品。
*   **Apple TV：** 自2022年以来未更新，预计将进行刷新，可能配备更快的芯片，但设计预计不会改变。

### 10. 苹果发布 iOS 26.0.1 修复 iPhone 17 机型上的 Wi-Fi、蜂窝网络和摄像头问题
*   **日期：** 2025年9月29日
*   **内容：** 苹果发布了 iOS 26.0.1 和 iPadOS 26.0.1，这是 iOS 26 和 iPadOS 26 操作系统的首次更新。
*   **修复内容：** 解决了可能导致 iPhone 17 机型上 Wi-Fi、蜂窝网络和摄像头出现异常的错误。
*   **获取方式：** 符合条件的 iPhone 和 iPad 用户可通过“设置”>“通用”>“软件更新”进行无线下载。
items.shortSummary: 苹果发布了 Safari 技术预览版 229，包含对辅助功能、CSS、JavaScript 等多方面的错误修复和性能改进，并兼容 macOS Sequoia 和 Tahoe。此版本旨在收集用户反馈，无需开发者账户即可使用。此外，近期苹果新闻还包括：iPhone 17 需求强劲；iOS 26.0.1 修复了 iPhone 17 的 Wi-Fi 和摄像头问题；iPhone 驾照功能已在11个美国州推出；以及 FCC 和 YouTube 泄露了搭载 M5 芯片的新款 iPad Pro、更新的 MacBook Pro 和下一代 Vision Pro 等产品。

items.content:
Apple today released a new update for Safari Technology Preview, the experimental browser that was first introduced in March 2016. Apple designed ‌Safari Technology Preview‌ to allow users to test features that are planned for future release versions of the Safari browser.


‌Safari Technology Preview‌ 229 includes fixes and updates for Accessibility, CSS, Events, Forms, JavaScript, Networking, SVG, Storage, Web API, Web Inspector, WebDriver, and WebGPU.

The current ‌Safari Technology Preview‌ release is compatible with machines running macOS Sequoia and macOS Tahoe, the newest version of macOS.

The ‌Safari Technology Preview‌ update is available through the Software Update mechanism in System Preferences or System Settings to anyone who has downloaded the browser from Apple’s website. Complete release notes for the update are available on the Safari Technology Preview website.

Apple’s aim with ‌Safari Technology Preview‌ is to gather feedback from developers and users on its browser development process. ‌Safari Technology Preview‌ can run side-by-side with the existing Safari browser and while it is designed for developers, it does not require a developer account to download and use.
Tag: Safari Technology Preview

items.title: 这就是为什么Apple Watch和Mac mini不再宣传为‘碳中和’产品 (原标题: Here's Why the Apple Watch and Mac Mini Are No Longer Advertised as 'Carbon Neutral')
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## Apple Watch和Mac mini不再宣传为“碳中和”

根据法国博客WatchGeneration的报道，苹果公司已停止在其官网上宣传Apple Watch和Mac mini为“碳中和”产品。

### “碳中和”的定义与苹果的实践

“碳中和”意味着产品在净排放上不向大气中增加任何二氧化碳。苹果通过减少排放和实施碳抵消项目来实现这一目标，例如与Forestal Apepu合作，在巴拉圭的退化土地上开发速生桉树林以用于木材生产。

此前，Apple Watch Series 9和Apple Watch Ultra 2（搭配特定表带）是苹果首批“碳中和”产品，Apple Watch Series 10和配备M4芯片的最新Mac mini也曾被宣传为“碳中和”。

### 苹果此前的“碳中和”标准（2023年）

苹果在2023年表示，每款“碳中和”Apple Watch型号都符合以下严格标准：

*   制造和产品使用100%采用清洁电力。
*   产品重量至少30%使用回收或可再生材料。
*   至少50%的运输不采用空运。

苹果称，这些综合努力使新Apple Watch型号的产品排放量至少减少了75%，并表示将使用“高质量碳信用”来抵消“少量剩余排放”。

### 变化的原因

从Apple Watch Series 11和Apple Watch Ultra 3开始，苹果在全球范围内的产品页面和包装上不再包含“碳中和”标签。Mac mini的产品页面也已移除此标签。这一变化在9月苹果iPhone发布会后全球生效，主要有以下几个原因：

1.  **欧盟新法：** 欧盟一项新法律将于2026年9月生效，届时将禁止公司在包装、广告和产品页面上使用“碳中和”或类似声明。
2.  **德国法院裁决：** 一家德国法院裁定Apple Watch不能再宣传为“碳中和”，此前一个当地环保组织指控苹果通过误导性的碳中和声明进行“漂绿”。
3.  **生态学家担忧：** 据路透社报道，一些生态学家认为碳抵消种植园实际上可能损害生物多样性并需要大量用水。

### 苹果的立场与未来目标

苹果环境副总裁Sarah Chandler向Fast Company表示，这一变化并非公司环保努力的改变。苹果内部可能仍认为Series 11、Ultra 3和Mac mini是碳中和的，但此举是为了遵守即将生效的法律和裁决，并避免混淆消费者。苹果仍致力于在2030年前实现其全球业务的碳中和。

苹果在一份声明中表示：“我们为我们的碳中和产品感到自豪，并有望在2030年前实现整个供应链的碳中和。每款苹果产品都以环保为理念设计，这一承诺将继续下去，无论欧盟关于我们如何谈论它的新规定如何。”

![m4 mac mini carbon neutral](https://images.macrumors.com/t/bwYluXO-wIQO_8Ys5eysbQixV_o=/400x0/article-new/2024/10/m4-mac-mini-carbon-neutral.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果已停止在全球范围内宣传Apple Watch和Mac mini为“碳中和”产品。此举主要因欧盟一项即将生效的法律将禁止此类声明，以及德国法院裁定Apple Watch不能再宣传为“碳中和”，此前苹果被指控“漂绿”。尽管苹果内部可能仍视这些产品为碳中和，但此变化旨在遵守法规并避免消费者混淆。苹果重申其到2030年实现全球业务碳中和的目标不变。
items.translated_title: 这就是为什么Apple Watch和Mac mini不再宣传为‘碳中和’产品
items.content:
As noted by the French blog WatchGeneration, the Apple Watch and Mac mini are no longer advertised as "carbon neutral" products on Apple's website.


The term "carbon neutral" means that, on a net basis, a product does not add any carbon dioxide to the atmosphere. Apple achieves this by reducing emissions and through projects that offset carbon, including working with Forestal Apepu to develop fast-growing eucalyptus forests for timber production on deforested lands in Paraguay.

When paired with select bands, the Apple Watch Series 9 and Apple Watch Ultra 2 models were Apple's first carbon-neutral products, and the Apple Watch Series 10 and the latest Mac mini with M4 chips were also advertised as being carbon neutral.

In 2023, Apple said each carbon neutral Apple Watch model met the following strict criteria: 100% clean electricity used for manufacturing and product use, at least 30% recycled or renewable material by weight, and at least 50% of shipments occurring without air transportation. Apple said these combined efforts resulted in at least a 75% reduction in product emissions for the new Apple Watch models, and it said it would use "high-quality carbon credits" to address the "small amount of remaining emissions."

However, starting with the Apple Watch Series 11 and Apple Watch Ultra 3, Apple no longer includes a "carbon neutral" label on its product pages or packaging worldwide. Apple also removed the label from its Mac mini product pages. This change took effect worldwide following Apple's iPhone event in September.

There are a few reasons why.

In August, Apple's vice president of environment Sarah Chandler told Fast Company that this change was not the result of a change in the company's environmental efforts. Instead, a new law in the EU taking effect in September 2026 will ban companies from using claims like "carbon neutral" or similar across packaging, ads, and product pages.

Second, a German court ruled the Apple Watch could no longer be advertised as "carbon neutral," after a local environmental group accused Apple of "greenwashing" with misleading carbon neutrality claims. According to Reuters, some ecologists said carbon offsetting plantations can actually harm biodiversity and require high water usage.

Apple likely still considers the Series 11 and Ultra 3 to be carbon neutral internally, but it is getting ahead of laws and rulings that prevent it from advertising it. Apple removed the label worldwide to avoid potentially confusing customers.

Given the Mac mini received no changes last month, it likely remains carbon neutral too.

Apple is still aiming for carbon neutrality across its global footprint by 2030.

"We're proud of our carbon neutral products and on track to achieve carbon neutrality throughout our entire supply chain by 2030," said Apple, in a statement shared with Fast Company. "Every Apple product is designed with the environment in mind, and that commitment will continue, regardless of new EU rules restricting how we can talk about it."

Tag: Apple Environment

items.title: Powerbeats Fit 评测：苹果新款 200 美元运动耳机取代 Beats Fit Pro (原标题: Powerbeats Fit Review: Apple's New $200 Workout Earbuds Replace Beats Fit Pro)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## Powerbeats Fit 评测：苹果新款 200 美元运动耳机

苹果旗下 Beats 品牌推出了专为健身设计的新款耳机 Powerbeats Fit。这款耳机定价 200 美元，旨在取代上一代 Beats Fit Pro，并与苹果的 AirPods Pro 3 形成差异化。

### 主要特点与设计

*   **运动导向设计**：Powerbeats Fit 专为运动、体育活动及其他需要入耳式稳固性的场景设计。
*   **佩戴稳固性**：配备硅胶耳塞和柔软的硅胶翼尖，可紧贴耳廓，确保在剧烈运动中也能保持稳固。
*   **改进的翼尖**：与 Beats Fit Pro 相比，Powerbeats Fit 的翼尖更灵活，能适应更广泛的耳型，提供更牢固的佩戴体验。
*   **耳塞尺寸**：提供从特小号到大号的多种耳塞尺寸，以适应不同的耳道。
*   **防水防汗**：具备 IPX4 级别防水性能，可有效防汗。

### 音频与技术

*   **降噪模式**：支持主动降噪 (ANC) 和通透模式。
*   **声学平台**：采用苹果设计的声学平台和专有驱动单元。
*   **音质表现**：音质与 AirPods Pro 3 相似，低音效果更强劲。
*   **降噪效果**：ANC 性能与 AirPods Pro 2 不相上下，能有效阻隔低频噪音。
*   **芯片**：搭载 H1 芯片，而非最新的 H2 芯片。H1 芯片支持快速配对、设备间自动切换、音频共享、Siri 集成和“查找”功能。
*   **设备控制**：耳机上设有控制按钮，可用于切换歌曲、更改听音模式和调节音量。

### 电池与充电

*   **续航时间**：耳机单次充电可提供约 7 小时的播放时间，充电盒可额外提供 30 小时的续航。
*   **充电盒**：采用 USB-C 充电接口，充电盒比 Beats Fit Pro 的充电盒更小巧，便于携带。
*   **快速充电**：支持 5 分钟快速充电，可提供 1 小时的听音时间。

### 兼容性与价格

*   **跨平台兼容**：Powerbeats Fit 在 Android 设备上也能良好运行，通过专用 Beats 应用可自定义功能，提供比 AirPods 更好的跨平台体验。
*   **价格与颜色**：售价 200 美元，提供四种颜色选择，包括与最新 iPhone 17 Pro 机型匹配的亮橙色。
*   **上市时间**：即日起发售。

### 与其他产品的比较

*   **与 Beats Fit Pro**：Powerbeats Fit 的翼尖更灵活，充电盒更小，价格相同。
*   **与 AirPods Pro 3**：Powerbeats Fit 便宜 50 美元，音质相似，但 AirPods Pro 3 采用 H2 芯片，且并非专门为运动设计。

### 其他信息

文章还提及了其他一些苹果相关新闻，包括对十月苹果发布会的预期、iPhone 驾驶执照功能在更多州上线、新款 iPad Pro (M5 芯片) 和 MacBook Pro 的泄露、iOS 26.1-26.4 的新功能、iPhone 17 系列的市场需求以及 iOS 26.0.1 的发布等，但这些内容与 Powerbeats Fit 的评测本身无直接关联。
items.shortSummary: 苹果发布了新款 Powerbeats Fit 运动耳机，定价 200 美元，旨在取代 Beats Fit Pro。这款耳机专为运动设计，拥有更灵活的翼尖和 IPX4 防水等级，确保佩戴稳固。它支持主动降噪和通透模式，音质与 AirPods Pro 3 相似，搭载 H1 芯片。耳机单次充电续航 7 小时，充电盒提供额外 30 小时。其 USB-C 充电盒更小巧，并提供优秀的跨平台兼容性，支持 Android 设备。Powerbeats Fit 已上市，有四种颜色可选。
items.translated_title: Powerbeats Fit 评测：苹果新款 200 美元运动耳机取代 Beats Fit Pro
items.content:
Apple's Beats brand has a new set of fitness-focused earbuds available, the Powerbeats Fit. We picked up a set of the Powerbeats Fit to see how they compare to the prior-generation Beats Fit Pro and Apple's AirPods Pro 3.

Subscribe to the MacRumors YouTube channel for more videos.

The Powerbeats Fit are designed for working out, playing sports, and other activities where in-ear security is important. The earbuds have silicone tips and a soft silicone wingtip that tucks up against the concha of the ear, holding them in place even during vigorous movement.

At $200, the Powerbeats Fit are $50 cheaper than the ‌AirPods Pro 3‌ and the same price as the prior-generation Beats Fit Pro, but they are targeted at a different market. The AirPods Pro can be used for working out, but aren't necessarily designed specifically for that purpose.

Apple made the wingtip of the Powerbeats Fit more flexible than the wingtip of the Beats Fit Pro, for a more secure fit in a wider range of ear sizes. There are ear tip sizes from extra small to large to fit different sized ear canals. There's an IPX4 water resistance rating, so they're sweat resistant.

The Powerbeats Fit include Active Noise Cancellation, Transparency mode, and an Apple-designed acoustic platform with proprietary drivers. The sound is similar to the sound you get with the ‌AirPods Pro 3‌, and it feels more bass heavy than before. ANC is about on par with the AirPods Pro 2, and it does a good job blocking out low frequency sounds.

You won't get the newer H2 chip, though, as the Powerbeats Fit are still using the H1. The H1 allows for quick pairing, automatic switching between devices, Audio Sharing, Hey Siri integration, and Find My support. There are on-device controls to swap songs, change listening modes, and adjust volume.

The USB-C charging case is smaller than the Beats Fit Pro case, so it's easier to carry in a pocket. You'll get around seven hours of playback per charge from the earbuds, and then another 30 hours from the case. Beats earbuds support a 5-minute Fast Fuel charge that gets you an hour of listening time.

What the Powerbeats Fit offer that the AirPods don't is better cross-platform compatibility. The Powerbeats Fit work just as well on Android devices, with customizable features enabled through a dedicated Beats app.

The Powerbeats Fit are $200 and come in four colors, including a bright orange that matches Apple's latest iPhone 17 Pro models. They're available for purchase starting today.

items.title: 苹果提供iOS 26中iMessage激活错误的修复方案 (原标题: Apple Provides Fix for iMessage Activation Bug in iOS 26)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# 苹果提供iOS 26中iMessage激活错误的修复方案

苹果公司本周发布了针对iOS 26中iMessage无法通过电话号码激活问题的故障排除步骤。

## 问题描述

部分iPhone用户在iOS 26中可能无法使用其电话号码激活iMessage。遇到此问题的用户会观察到以下症状：

*   发送的iMessage显示“未送达”警报。
*   无法接收iMessage。
*   消息将通过RCS或SMS发送和接收，并显示绿色气泡而非蓝色气泡。
*   或者，iMessage可能使用电子邮件地址而非电话号码发送。

## 根本原因

根据苹果的说法，此问题是由于iPhone上存在一个非活跃的SIM卡或eSIM，而该非活跃卡与当前活跃的SIM卡拥有相同的电话号码。

## 解决方案步骤

要解决此问题并使iMessage正常工作，用户应遵循以下步骤：

1.  **移除非活跃SIM卡：**
    *   前往“设置”应用中的“蜂窝网络”部分。
    *   如果显示两个具有相同电话号码的SIM卡，请删除非活跃的SIM卡。
    *   如果非活跃SIM卡是物理SIM卡，请将其从iPhone中取出。
    *   如果非活跃SIM卡是eSIM，可以从“蜂窝网络”界面中删除。
2.  **重新激活iMessage：**
    *   移除非活跃SIM卡后，前往“信息”应用。
    *   点击“发送与接收”。
    *   点击显示的电话号码以完成iMessage的激活。

## 相关图片

![iOS 26 Messages Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/1XAQeERAXrrbuh0764aXvhsLyvY=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/iOS-26-Messages-Feature-2-1.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果发布了iOS 26中iMessage激活错误的修复方案。该问题表现为iMessage无法通过电话号码激活，发送消息显示“未送达”，并以绿色气泡形式发送。原因是iPhone上存在与活跃SIM卡号码相同的非活跃SIM卡（物理或eSIM）。用户需在“设置”>“蜂窝网络”中移除非活跃SIM卡，然后前往“信息”>“发送与接收”重新激活iMessage即可解决。
items.translated_title: 苹果提供iOS 26中iMessage激活错误的修复方案
items.content:
Apple this week provided troubleshooting steps for iPhone owners who are unable to activate iMessage with a phone number in iOS 26.


According to Apple, some customers might not be able to activate iMessage with a phone number if there is an inactive SIM or eSIM with the same phone number as an active SIM on the ‌iPhone‌.

Customers who are experiencing this problem will see a "Not Delivered" alert for sent iMessages, and iMessages won't be able to be received. Messages will be sent and received via RCS or SMS, and will have green bubbles instead of blue bubbles. Alternatively, iMessages might be sent using an email address instead of a phone number.

To get iMessage to work in that situation, users should remove the inactive SIM and attempt to reactivate iMessage. Deleting a SIM that's not in use can be done by going to the Cellular section of the Settings app, and deleting the inactive SIM if there are two displayed with the same phone number.

If the inactive SIM is a physical SIM, it should be removed from the ‌iPhone‌. If the inactive SIM is an eSIM, it can be deleted from the Cellular interface. After the inactive SIM has been removed, iMessage can be activated by going to Messages, tapping on Send and Receive, and tapping on the displayed phone number.
